question: A box contains 4 blue, 6 black, and 2 white marbles. If 3 marbles are drawn at random, what is the probability that all are black?
The second term of an AP is 8 and the 8th term is 2 more than thrice the second term. Find the sum of the first 20 terms.
A and B together can do a piece of work in 12 days. A alone can do it in 20 days. How long will B alone take?
A student scores 72 marks in English, 65 in Maths, 70 in Science, and 63 in Hindi. If the maximum marks for each subject are 100, what is his overall percentage?
The average weight of 10 students is 45 kg. If one more student joins and the new average becomes 46 kg, find the weight of the new student.
